text: The men's 3000 metres steeplechase event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 22 and 24 August. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Julius Chelule ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Kipkirui Misoi ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Ali Ezzine ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 24 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
